color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

complete-icon.description: Icon to display when step is marked as completed.
complete-icon.description_zh: 步骤标记为完成时显示的图标。

disabled.description: Remove the component's click or target functionality.
disabled.description_zh: 移除组件的单击或 target 功能。

edit-icon.description: Icon to display when step is editable.
edit-icon.description_zh: 步骤可编辑时显示的图标。

error.description: Puts the stepper item in a manual error state.
error.description_zh: 将步进程序项置于手动错误状态。

error-icon.description: Icon to display when step has an error.
error-icon.description_zh: 步骤出错时显示的图标。

icon.description: Assign a v-icon icon to the button.
icon.description_zh: 为按钮指定一个 v-icon 图标。

rules.description: Accepts a mixed array of types function, boolean and string. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either true / false or a string containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) false or is a string.
rules.description_zh: 接受 function、boolean 和 string 类型的混合数组。函数将输入值作为参数传递，并且必须返回 true / false 或包含错误消息的字符串。如果函数返回（或数组中的任何值包含）false 或字符串，则输入字段将进入错误状态。

selected-class.description: Configure the name of the CSS class that will be applied when the selected item is selected.
selected-class.description_zh: 配置被选中项目时应用的 CSS 类名。

subtitle.description: Specify a subtitle text for the component.
subtitle.description_zh: 指定组件的副标题文本。

title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

value.description: The value used when selecting a component in a group. If not provided, a unique ID is used.
value.description_zh: 在组中选择组件时使用的值。如果没有提供，则使用唯一 ID。

events.name: group:selected
events.description: Event that is emitted when an item is selected within a group.
events.description_zh: 在组中选择项目时发出的事件。

slots.name: default
slots.params:
{
  canEdit: boolean
  hasError: boolean
  hasCompleted: boolean
  title: string | number
  subtitle: string | number
  step: any
}

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Slot for customizing all stepper item icons.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义所有步进项图标的插槽。
slots.params:
{
  canEdit: boolean
  hasError: boolean
  hasCompleted: boolean
  title: string | number
  subtitle: string | number
  step: any
}

slots.name: subtitle
slots.description: Slot for the component’s subtitle content.
slots.params:
{
  canEdit: boolean
  hasError: boolean
  hasCompleted: boolean
  title: string | number
  subtitle: string | number
  step: any
}

slots.name: title
slots.description: Slot for the component’s title content.
slots.params:
{
  canEdit: boolean
  hasError: boolean
  hasCompleted: boolean
  title: string | number
  subtitle: string | number
  step: any
}
